$WmMPID_ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Normal,Face|Foul Heroes, beware! I, L'Arachel,
bestow upon you the honor of defeat
at my blessed hands!$k$pTo battle, Eirika!$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク2,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal2,Face|For as long as we are bound by this
contract, we have no choice but to
fight!$k$p$Sbs1000|
